The park hotel
Serena sea-facing boutique hotel
Recipient of the 5star tourism excellence award for andhra pradesh state.Unfolding across six acres of tropical gardens, this luxury retreat has been made with love by local craftsmen and rejuvenated by a recent renovation.Generously proportioned rooms with abstract furnishings and dialled-back comfort, offering sea views, coconut trees and expansive lawns leading to the beach.

Ambica Sea Green hotel
Nestled opposite the gorgeous Rk beach
Ambica Sea Green is a great choice for travellers looking for a 3 star hotel in Visakhapatnam. It is located in Dr NTR Beach Road. This Hotel stands out as one of the highly recommended hotel in Visakhapatnam.The property enjoys a great location advantage and provides easy and fast connectivity to the major transit points of the city.

V hotel
A hotel near Visakhapatnam railway station
V hotel is one of the leading hotels in Andhra Pradesh. Featuring an elegant mix of style and comfort. The V hotel offers a pleasant stay in the bustling city of Visakhapatnam.Being located in a prime location,all the major travel hubs and tourists attractions are in the close proximity.

Hotel winsar park
Very clean and well maintained hotel.
Hotel Winsar Park is 2 Km from Beach Road, Kailasagiri and Submarine. Vishakhapatnam Airport is 10 km away. The Vishakhapatnam Zoo is 5 km away.Hotel Winsar Park offers car rental and currency exchange facilities. Guests can approach the tour desk for assistance with travel arrangements.
